comment.author: 14063050@N05
comment._content: Rabbi Aaron Teitelbaum (my great-grand-father) is the gentleman on the left  with the beard. Being a founder of the JDC or Joint was among his many significant accomplishments. I do not know who the other unidentified person on the right is though I bet the JDC might. My other guess of who might know is my grand-uncle his son. Another place that might know is the Jewish Museum in NY which had the same picture hanging for many years.
